io.wcm.wcm.ui.extjs.provider

Class AbstractPageProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • org.apache.sling.api.servlets.SlingSafeMethodsServlet
        • io.wcm.wcm.ui.extjs.provider.AbstractPageProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractPageListProvider, AbstractPageTreeProvider

    @ConsumerType
public abstract class AbstractPageProvider
extends org.apache.sling.api.servlets.SlingSafeMethodsServlet
    Common functionality for AbstractPageListProvider and AbstractPageTreeProvider.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getRootResource

        protected final org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource getRootResource(org.apache.sling.api.SlingHttpServletRequest request)
        Determine root resource to list its children. (use resource for root page because root node does not have to be a page but can be e.g. a nt:folder node)
        Parameters:
        request - Request
        Returns:
        Root resource or null if invalid resource was referenced

      • getPageFilter

        protected com.day.cq.wcm.api.PageFilter getPageFilter(org.apache.sling.api.SlingHttpServletRequest request)
        Can be overridden by subclasses to filter page list via page filter. If not overridden it supports defining a page filter via "predicate" request attribute.
        Parameters:
        request - Request
        Returns:
        Page filter or null if no filtering applies
